title: State: Setup Zustand Store & Supabase Realtime

title: Database Security: Implement Row-Level Security Policies
description:
## Context
Implement Row-Level Security policies for all user-owned tables.

## Risk: MEDIUM
Security-critical. Must ensure no data leakage between users.

## File Scope
- supabase/migrations/002_rls_policies.sql

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] RLS enabled on: notes, tasks, protected_slots, chat_messages, weekly_reviews, focus_sessions
- [ ] SELECT/INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE policies use auth.uid() = user_id
- [ ] Users table has appropriate policies (users can only see/update own profile)
- [ ] Service role bypasses RLS for admin operations
- [ ] Test: Authenticated user cannot see other users data
- [ ] Test: Unauthenticated requests are rejected

title: Settings: Implement BYOK API Keys with Encryption
description:
## Context
Implement secure storage for user-provided API keys (BYOK).

## Risk: HIGH
Security-critical. Encryption must be done correctly. REQUIRES SPIKE.

## Spike Required
Before implementation, validate:
- AES-256-GCM encryption in Node.js/Edge runtime
- Key derivation from ENCRYPTION_KEY env var
- Secure key input UI pattern (masked, never logged)

## File Scope
- lib/crypto/encrypt.ts
- lib/crypto/decrypt.ts
- app/api/user/api-keys/route.ts
- components/settings/ApiKeysSection.tsx

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] API key input with password-type masking
- [ ] Keys encrypted with AES-256-GCM before storage
- [ ] Encryption key from ENCRYPTION_KEY env var
- [ ] Encrypted keys stored in users.api_keys JSONB
- [ ] Keys NEVER returned to client (only 'configured: true/false')
- [ ] Decryption only happens server-side when calling AI APIs
- [ ] Test: Verify encrypted value is not plaintext in DB
